svt_i2c_master_monitor_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_master_monitor_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Monitor callback class contains the callback methods called by the I2C Monitor component.


Public Member Functions

virtual function void  config_pre_output_port_put ( svt_i2c_master_monitor monitor , svt_i2c_agent_configuration cfg )
virtual function void  master_transaction_ended ( svt_i2c_master_monitor monitor , svt_i2c_master_transaction xact )

virtual function void  master_transaction_started ( svt_i2c_master_monitor monitor , svt_i2c_master_transaction xact )

function void  new ( string name = "svt_i2c_master_monitor_callback" )

Member Function Documentation

 virtual function void
 svt_i2c_master_monitor_callback::config_pre_output_port_put
 (  svt_i2c_master_monitor monitor , svt_i2c_agent_configuration cfg  ) 

Called before putting a configuration

monitor - A reference to the svt_i2c_master_monitor component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

cfg - A reference to the configuration descriptor object of interest.

 Superseding functions 
 svt_i2c_master_monitor_xml_writer_callback :: config_pre_output_port_put

Called after recognizing the end of a transaction

monitor - A reference to the svt_i2c_master_monitor component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

 virtual function void
 svt_i2c_master_monitor_callback::master_transaction_insert_stop
 (  svt_i2c_master_monitor monitor , svt_i2c_master_transaction data_obj , output bit do_insert_stop , output int wait_for_bytes  ) 

Called after recognizing a data byte and it's ack/nack in a transaction

monitor - A reference to the svt_i2c_master_monitor component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

data_obj - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

 virtual function void
 svt_i2c_master_monitor_callback::master_xact_observed_cov
 (  svt_i2c_master_monitor monitor , svt_i2c_master_transaction xact  ) 

Callback issued to allow the testbench to collect functional coverage information from a transaction that is put into the analysis port.

monitor - A reference to the svt_i2c_master_monitor component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

 Superseding functions

 Superseding functions 
 svt_i2c_master_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks :: new 

 virtual function void
 svt_i2c_master_monitor_callback::pre_master_xact_observed_put
 (  svt_i2c_master_monitor monitor , svt_i2c_master_transaction xact , ref bit drop  ) 

Called before putting a transaction to the analysis port.

monitor - A reference to the svt_i2c_master_monitor component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

drop - A ref argument, which if set by the user's callback implementation causes the transactor to discard the transaction descriptor without further action.

 Superseding functions 
 svt_i2c_master_monitor_xml_writer_callback :: pre_master_xact_observed_put
